name: Heineken
description: Heineken'sÂ® iconic taste comes from its simplicity, quality and dedication to pure natural ingredients: the perfect medley of malt, barley, hops and our own special A-Yeast.

name: Budweiser
description: Budweiser is a medium-bodied, flavorful, crisp and pure beer with blended layers of premium American and European hop aromas, brewed for the perfect balance of flavor and refreshment.
